statements: SELECT * FROM credit_card_usage;
SELECT card_holder_name, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_usage WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT merchant_name, transaction_date, category FROM credit_card_usage ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT card_number, category FROM credit_card_usage WHERE merchant_name = 'Amazon';
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_transaction_amount FROM credit_card_usage;
SELECT card_holder_name, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_usage WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_usage WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT card_holder_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM credit_card_usage GROUP BY card_holder_name HAVING total_spent > 500 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT merchant_name FROM credit_card_usage ORDER BY merchant_name ASC;

SELECT card_holder_name, AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_spent FROM credit_card_usage WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY card_holder_name HAVING average_spent > 500 ORDER BY average_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT cardholder_id, cardholder_name FROM cardholders ORDER BY cardholder_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT cardholder_name, card_limit FROM cardholders WHERE card_limit < 5000;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 AND card_number = '1234567890123456' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE card_number = '9876543210987654' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT cardholder_id, cardholder_name FROM cardholders WHERE card_limit >= 5000 ORDER BY cardholder_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM credit_card_transactions;
SELECT cardholder_id, SUM(card_limit) AS total_limit FROM cardholders GROUP BY cardholder_id HAVING total_limit > 10000;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT card_number, transaction_amount, merchant_name FROM credit_card_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM cardholders WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT name, address, email FROM cardholders WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT cardholder_id, name, address FROM cardholders WHERE date_of_birth < '1995-01-01';
SELECT cardholder_id, score, credit_limit FROM credit_score WHERE score < 600 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, merchant_name FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE merchant_name LIKE '%Mart%' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;

SELECT cct.transaction_id, c.name, cs.credit_limit FROM credit_card_transactions cct JOIN cardholders c ON cct.card_number = c.cardholder_id JOIN credit_score cs ON c.cardholder_id = cs.cardholder_id WHERE cs.credit_limit > 5000 ORDER BY cct.transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards;
SELECT card_number, holder_name, card_type FROM credit_cards ORDER BY card_number DESC;
SELECT holder_name, card_type, credit_limit FROM credit_cards WHERE credit_limit > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT assessment_id, risk_score, assessment_date FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score >= 80;
SELECT card_number, holder_name, card_type, credit_limit FROM credit_cards WHERE card_number = 12345;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, risk_score FROM customers c JOIN risk_assessment ra ON c.customer_id = ra.customer_id WHERE risk_score > 80;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.customer_name, SUM(t.amount) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.card_number GROUP BY c.customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards;
SELECT card_holder_name, credit_limit FROM credit_cards WHERE card_type = 'Visa';
SELECT card_holder_name, card_status FROM credit_cards ORDER BY card_holder_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT card_holder_name, card_type, credit_limit FROM credit_cards WHERE credit_limit > 5000 ORDER BY credit_limit ASC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE card_type = 'Visa' ORDER BY credit_limit DESC;
SELECT card_holder_name, card_type, credit_limit FROM credit_cards WHERE credit_limit > 1000 ORDER BY card_holder_name ASC;
SELECT card_id, card_type, card_status FROM credit_cards WHERE card_holder_name LIKE 'A%' AND card_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name;
